message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount. I would like to counteroffer at $95 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll counteroffer at $105 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Let me counteroffer at $100 for the product.
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob! However, I still need to make a profit. I'll counteroffer at $102 for the product.
